snippet: The Goodman Theatre is the latest company to join a national push to stage a night of short plays about the killing of Trayvon Martin....

headline.print_headline: Goodman Theatre Tackles Trayvon Martin Killing
headline.main: Goodman Theatre Tackles Trayvon Martin Killing

lead_paragraph: The Goodman Theatre is the latest company to join a national push to stage a night of short plays about the killing of Trayvon Martin.
